about_description: Jifunze zaidi kuhusu OnlineMarkdown.com, zana ya bure na wazi iliyoundwa kurahisisha kuandika kwa sintaksi ya Markdown. Jiunge na jumuiya yetu leo.
about_intro1: Kihariri cha Markdown Mtandoni (OnlineMarkdown.com) ni zana ya bure na wazi inayokusaidia kuandika na kuangalia maudhui ya Markdown kwa wakati halisi. Dhamira yetu ni kutoa kiolesura rahisi na angavu cha kuunda hati zilizo na muundo mzuri kwa sintaksi ya Markdown.
about_intro2: Iwe unandika hati, unaunda maudhui kwa blogu yako, au unachukua maelezo, kihariri chetu kinawezesha kuzingatia maudhui yako huku ukihakikisha muundo unaofaa.
about_intro3: Tunaamini nguvu ya Markdown kama muundo wa kuandika ulimwenguni unaochanganya urahisi na uwezo wa muundo. Zana yetu imeundwa kufanya muundo huu uwe wa kila mtu.
about_story: Ilianzishwa kwa shauku ya kuandika safi na kwa ufanisi, Kihariri cha Markdown Mtandoni kilizaliwa kutoka tamaa ya kurahisisha jinsi watu wanavyounda na kushiriki mawazo yao. Baadaye, tumekua kuwa jumuiya hai ya waandishi, wasanidi na wabunifu wanaotegemea Markdown kwa unyumbufu na urahisi wake.
about_mission1: Dhamira yetu ni kuwawezesha watumiaji kwa zana inayofanya kuandika na kuunda muundo iwe rahisi iwezekanavyo. Tumejitolea kuboresha kila wakati, kutokana na maoni ya jumuiya yetu na mabadiliko ya kuandika kidijitali.
about_mission2: Katika OnlineMarkdown.com, tunaamini ushirikiano wa chanzo wazi, uvumbuzi na demokrasia ya zana za kuandika kidijitali za hali ya juu.
about_community1: Sio tu kihariri—tuna jumuiya. Jukwaa letu linahimiza michango kutoka kwa watumiaji ulimwenguni, na tunathamini kila maoni na pendekezo. Kwa kushirikiana, tunaunda zana inayofaa kila mtu.
about_community2: Iwe wewe ni msanidi mwenye uzoefu au mwandishi mwanafunzi, sauti yako ina maana kwetu. Jiunge na jumuiya yetu, shiriki mawazo yako na tusaidie kuunda mustakabali wa kuandika kidijitali.
about_whyTitle: Kwa Nini Kuchagua Kihariri cha Markdown Mtandoni?
about_why1: Onyo la Markdown la wakati halisi kwa kuangalia maudhui yako mara moja
about_why2: Kiolesura safi, bila vipingamizi kwa kuandika kwa umakini
about_why3: Mradi wa chanzo wazi na jumuiya hai ya wachangiaji
about_why4: Kihariri rahisi, kinachofaa kwa mahitaji yako yote ya kuandika
about_contactPrefix: Una maswali au mapendekezo? Jisikie huru kutupigia simu kupitia

contact_intro: Una maswali au mapendekezo? Tunapenda kusikia kutoka kwako! Unaweza kutufikia kupitia njia zifuatazo:
contact_closing: Tunalenga kujibu maombi yote ndani ya saa 24-48. Asante kwa kupendezwa na Kihariri cha Markdown Mtandoni!
gettingStarted_description: Jifunze misingi ya sintaksi ya Markdown, muundo na jinsi ya kutumia kihariri chetu mtandoni. Inafaa kwa wanaoanza kujua lugha hii nyepesi ya uchapishaji.
gettingStarted_keywords: mafunzo ya markdown, misingi ya markdown, mwongozo wa markdown, kihariri cha markdown, sintaksi ya markdown, jifunze markdown, markdown kwa wanaoanza
gettingStarted_what1: Markdown ni lugha nyepesi ya uchapishaji inayokuruhusu kuandika maandishi yaliyo na muundo kwa sintaksi ya maandishi yaliyonyooka. Imebuniwa kuwa rahisi kusoma na kuandika, inafaa kwa hati, kuchukua maelezo na kuunda maudhui.
gettingStarted_what2: Iliundwa na John Gruber mnamo 2004, Markdown imekuwa moja ya lugha za uchapishaji zinazopendwa zaidi ulimwenguni. Inatumika sana kwenye mazingira kama GitHub, Reddit, Stack Overflow na mifumo mingi ya usimamizi wa maudhui.
gettingStarted_why1Text: Andika maudhui bila wasiwasi wa muundo mgumu
gettingStarted_why2Text: Badilisha kwa HTML, PDF au miundo mingine kwa urahisi
gettingStarted_why3Text: Maudhui yanaweza kusomwa hata kwa fomu yasiyokamilika
gettingStarted_why4Text: Inafanya kazi kwenye kihariri chochote cha maandishi au mazingira
gettingStarted_why6Text: Inatumika kwenye mazingira na programu nyingi
gettingStarted_why7Text: Muundo wa maandishi yaliyonyooka unahakikisha ufikiaji wa muda mrefu
gettingStarted_editorIntro: Kihariri chetu cha Markdown kimeundwa kufanya kuandika na kuangalia Markdown kuwa rahisi iwezekanavyo:
gettingStarted_step2Text: maudhui yako kwenye paneli ya kushoto
gettingStarted_step3: Angalia onyo la moja kwa moja
gettingStarted_step4Text: kwa muundo wa haraka bila kukariri sintaksi
gettingStarted_step5Text: kwa kiotomatiki kwenye hifadhi ya ndani
gettingStarted_feature1Text: Hariri na angalia maudhui yako wakati huo huo
gettingStarted_feature2Text: Inafanya msimbo wako wa Markdown usomwe kwa urahisi
gettingStarted_feature3Text: Unda, hariri na panga hati nyingi
gettingStarted_feature4Text: Usipoteze kazi yako kwa kuhifadhi kiotomatiki
gettingStarted_feature5Text: Ongeza kasi ya kazi yako kwa njia za mkato
gettingStarted_feature6Text: Inafanya kazi kwenye kompyuta, kibao na vifaa vya rununu
gettingStarted_feature7Text: Punguza msongo wa macho unapofanya kazi usiku
gettingStarted_bp1Text: Use the simplest syntax that achieves your formatting goals
gettingStarted_bp2Text: Use the same style throughout your document
gettingStarted_bp3Text: Create a clear hierarchy with your headings
gettingStarted_bp4Text: Check how your document looks as you write
gettingStarted_bp6Text: For documents with many links, use reference-style links
gettingStarted_bp7Text: Use blank lines between paragraphs and sections for readability

gettingStarted_notesText: Take organized, formatted notes that are easy to review and share.
gettingStarted_contentText: Write blog posts, articles, and other content with clean formatting.

cheatSheet_title: Karatasi ya Mwongozo ya Markdown | OnlineMarkdown.com
cheatSheet_description: Karatasi kamili ya mwongozo ya Markdown yenye sintaksi ya msingi na ya hali ya juu, mifano, vidokezo na mbinu bora kwa kuandika Markdown kwa ufanisi.
cheatSheet_keywords: markdown, karatasi ya mwongozo, rejeo la haraka, sintaksi, muundo, hati, kihariri cha markdown, vitalu vya msimbo, majedwali, orodha
cheatSheet_intro: Karatasi hii ya mwongozo inatoa rejeo la haraka kwa vitu vinavyotumika zaidi vya sintaksi ya Markdown. Itumie kama mwongozo unapoandika hati zako za Markdown.
cheatSheet_lineBreakHint: End a line with two spaces
cheatSheet_tip5: Use **```** for code blocks with syntax highlighting
syntax_description: A comprehensive guide to Markdown syntax, including headings, paragraphs, formatting, lists, code blocks, and more. Learn how to format your documents with Markdown.
syntax_keywords: markdown, syntax, guide, formatting, documentation, text editor, markdown editor, headings, lists, code blocks, links, images, tables
syntax_subtitle: Essential syntax for formatting your documents
syntax_overview1: Markdown is a lightweight markup language that you can use to add formatting elements to plaintext text documents. Created by John Gruber in 2004, Markdown is now one of the world's most popular markup languages.
syntax_overview2: Using Markdown is different than using a WYSIWYG editor. In an application like Microsoft Word, you click buttons to format words and phrases, and the changes are visible immediately. Markdown isn't like that. When you create a Markdown-formatted file, you add Markdown syntax to the text to indicate which words and phrases should look different.
syntax_headingsIntro: To create a heading, add number signs (#) in front of a word or phrase. The number of number signs you use should correspond to the heading level. For example, to create a heading level three, use three number signs (e.g., ### My Heading).
syntax_paragraphsIntro: To create paragraphs, use a blank line to separate one or more lines of text.
syntax_lineBreaksIntro: To create a line break or new line, end a line with two or more spaces, and then press return.
syntax_emphasisIntro: You can add emphasis by making text bold or italic.
syntax_boldIntro: To bold text, add two asterisks (**) or underscores (__) before and after a word or phrase.
syntax_italicIntro: To italicize text, add one asterisk (*) or underscore (_) before and after a word or phrase.
syntax_boldItalicIntro: To emphasize text with bold and italics at the same time, add three asterisks (***) or underscores (___) before and after a word or phrase.
syntax_blockquotesIntro: To create a blockquote, add a > in front of a paragraph.
syntax_nestedBlockquotesIntro: Blockquotes can be nested. Add a >> in front of the paragraph you want to nest.
syntax_listsIntro: You can organize items into ordered and unordered lists.
syntax_orderedListsIntro: To create an ordered list, add line items with numbers followed by periods. The numbers don't have to be in numerical order, but the list should start with the number one.
syntax_unorderedListsIntro: To create an unordered list, add dashes (-), asterisks (*), or plus signs (+) in front of line items.
syntax_codeIntro: To denote a word or phrase as code, enclose it in backticks (`).
syntax_codeBlocksIntro: To create code blocks, indent every line of the block by at least four spaces or one tab, or use triple backticks (```) before and after the code block.
syntax_horizontalRulesIntro: To create a horizontal rule, use three or more asterisks (***), dashes (---), or underscores (___) on a line by themselves.
syntax_linksIntro: To create a link, enclose the link text in brackets (e.g., [Duck Duck Go]) and then follow it immediately with the URL in parentheses (e.g., (https://duckduckgo.com)).
syntax_addingTitlesIntro: You can optionally add a title for a link. This will appear as a tooltip when the user hovers over the link. To add a title, enclose it in quotation marks after the URL.
syntax_imagesIntro: To add an image, add an exclamation mark (!), followed by alt text in brackets, and the path or URL to the image asset in parentheses. You can optionally add a title in quotation marks after the path or URL.
syntax_escapingIntro: To display a literal character that would otherwise be used to format text in a Markdown document, add a backslash (\) in front of the character.
syntax_escapingCharsIntro: You can use a backslash to escape the following characters:
syntax_tablesIntro: To add a table, use three or more hyphens (---) to create each column's header, and use pipes (|) to separate each column. You can optionally add pipes on either end of the table.
syntax_alignmentIntro: You can align text in the columns to the left, right, or center by adding a colon (:) to the left, right, or on both sides of the hyphens within the header row.
privacy_description: Read the Privacy Policy of Online Markdown Editor, which explains how we handle your data, cookies, and third-party services.
privacy_s1: Online Markdown Editor is a client-side application that processes your content locally in your browser. We do not collect or store any of your content or personal information.
privacy_s2: Since we don't collect any personal information, we don't use or share any data. All your content remains on your device and is processed locally.
privacy_s3: We may use cookies to improve your experience on our site, such as remembering your preferences. These cookies are not used to track or collect personal information.
privacy_s4: We may integrate with third-party services to enhance the functionality and performance of our application. These services may collect limited data as specified in their respective policies.
privacy_s5: We take the security of your data seriously. Although our application does not store your content, we use industry-standard security measures to protect your interactions with our site, including secure transmission protocols (HTTPS) and regular security updates.
privacy_s6: Since we do not store or process personal data, you retain full control over your content. If you have any questions about your rights or how our application works, please feel free to reach out.
privacy_s7: Our application is designed for users of all ages. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children. If you are under the age of 13, please ensure that you have permission from a parent or guardian before using our site.
privacy_s8: As our service operates entirely on the client side, there is no transfer of your personal information between countries. All processing happens locally in your browser.
privacy_s9: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.
privacy_s10Prefix: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at

markdownToPdf_step3: Click the **Print** icon in the toolbar
markdownToPdf_step4: In the Print dialog, choose **Save as PDF** or **Save as PDF** as the destination
markdownToPdf_step5: Click Save — you get your PDF file

markdownToPdf_faq3a: Yes. It supports GitHub Flavored Markdown, including tables, code blocks (with syntax highlighting), and Mermaid diagrams. When you export markdown to pdf, those elements are preserved in the PDF.
